content.question: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate. (a) Define political legitimacy. (b) Describe a source of political legitimacy for a regime. (c) Explain how a specific factor can undermine the political legitimacy of a regime. (d) Explain why authoritarian regimes seek legitimacy.
